creator: arjan@almekinders.org
text:
I made a simple login behind a proxy. In previous versions of Apache it always 
worked.
As of 1.3.24, the POSTed data doesn't arrive at the other machine. The result 
that I get in return are random. For example, I get an html page containing a 
zero ("0").

creator: minfrin@sharp.fm
text:
This problem is most likely caused by either the lack of dechunking support in
1.3.24, or the lack of unexpected-100-continue handling. Both of these are fixed
in 1.3.26-dev, please test on the latest version.

If it still gives the same problem, reopen this bug report.
